IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO INITIATE, STIMULATE, AND AID IN THE IMPROVEMENT OF LIVING CONDITIONS, PRINCIPALLY THOUGH NOT EXCLUSIVELY IN RENSSELAER COUNTY, NEW YORK.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO INITIATE, STIMULATE, AND AID IN THE IMPROVEMENT OF LIVING CONDITIONS, PRINCIPALLY THOUGH NOT EXCLUSIVELY IN RENSSELAER COUNTY, NEW YORK; IN PARTICULAR TO MAKE DECENT HOUSING AVAILABLE TO PEOPLE OF LOW INCOME.
IRS990.Desc: PRESERVE AND REHABILITATE HOUSING FOR LOW INCOME FAMILIES AND ELDERLY PERSONS IN TROY, NY: LEVERAGING OVER $6 MILLION IN PRIVATE INVESTMENT AND $1 MILLION IN PUBLIC INVESTMENT; ALSO DURING THE YEAR: PROVIDED PRE-PURCHASE COUNSELING TO FAMILIES; MADE REPAIRS TO HOMES; MANAGED AFFORDABLE APARTMENTS; ASSISTED LOW INCOME FAMILIES ACHIEVE HOME OWNERSHIP; PROVIDED FORECLOSURE ASSISTANCE TO FAMILIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NET ASSETS SUBJECT TO DONOR-IMPOSED STIPULATIONS RESULTING FROM VARIOUS GRANTS AWARDED TO SUPPORT THE ACTIVITIES OF THE ORGANIZATION.

NOTE I - INCOME TAXES THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE HAS DETERMINED THAT TRIP IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAX UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. TRIP DOES NOT CONDUCT UNRELATED BUSINESS ACTIVITIES AND, THEREFORE, HAS MADE NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADOPTED THE PROVISION OF FASB ASC 740-10, ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. MANAGEMENT EVALUATED THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX POSITIONS, INCLUDING INTEREST AND PENALTIES ATTRIBUTABLE THERETO, AND CONCLUDED THAT THE ORGANIZATION HAD TAKEN NO TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRED ADJUSTMENT IN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS OF APRIL 30, 2018 AND 2017. THE ORGANIZATION'S INCOME TAX FILINGS ARE SUBJECT TO AUDIT BY VARIOUS TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE ORGANIZATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY TAXING AUTHORITIES FOR THE YEARS ENDING BEFORE APRIL 30, 2015, AND CURRENTLY, THERE ARE NO INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS IN PROCESS NOR HAS THE ORGANIZATION BEEN INFORMED OF ANY PENDING INCOME TAX EXAMINATION. IN EVALUATING THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX PROVISIONS AND ACCRUALS, FUTURE TAXABLE INCOME, AND THE REVERSAL OF TEMPORARY DIFFERENCES, INTERPRETATIONS, AND TAX PLANNING STRATEGIES ARE CONSIDERED. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THEIR ESTIMATES ARE APPROPRIATE BASED ON CURRENT FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BY-LAWS WERE AMENDED TO ADD THE FOLLOWING LANGUAGE RESTRICTING QUALIFICATION OF BOARD MEMBERS: "TRIP SHALL RESTRICT THE REPRESENTATION OF PUBLIC OFFICIALS OR EMPLOYEES OF GOVERNMENTAL ENTITIES TO NO MORE THAN ONE-THIRD OF THE BOARD MAKEUP. NO GOVERNMENT OFFICIAL OR EMPLOYEE SHALL BE AN OFFICER OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OR EMPLOYEE OF THE CHDO. TRIP WILL SATISFY AND MAINTAIN A MINIMUM OF ONE-THIRD OF ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS WITH LOW INCOME REPRESENTATIVES. THIS REPRESENTATION WILL BE COMPRISED OF EITHER RESIDENTS OF QUALIFIED LOW INCOME HOUSEHOLDS OR RESIDENTS OF LOW INCOME QUALIFYING CENSUS TRACTS."

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD REVIEWS FORM 990 AT A REGULARLY SCHEDULED BOARD MEETING BEFORE IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, AND MEMBERS OF COMMITTEES WITH BOARD DELEGATED POWERS ANNUALLY SIGN THE ORGANIZATION'S CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS SET BY THE BOARD WITH AN ANNUAL REVIEW EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES FORM 990 AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.
INCOME FROM PARTNERSHIP INVESTMENTS NOT RECORDED ON BOOKS -286.
THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE IN THE OVERSIGHT OR SELECTION PROCESS.
